contentrichtext.text: '''XAMLPad''' is a lightweight tool originally provided with the [[.NET Framework 3.0]] [[Software development kit|SDK]] to quickly create simple [[Extensible Application Markup Language|Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML)]] files. It provides a split screen where the XAML code can be typed and immediately previewed in the XAML renderer. No longer bundled with later Microsoft SDKs, this useful educational tool is however still under active development, and can be downloaded from the links below. It has been renamed XamlpadX. ==External links== *[http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms742398.aspx XAMLPad overview at MSDN] * [http://blogs.msdn.com/b/llobo/archive/2008/08/25/xamlpadx-4-0.aspx XAMLPadX 4.0 Web Page] [[Category:.NET programming tools]] {{markup-languages-stub}}
